title: The Ultimate HydraWorks Facial
description: A Water microdermabrasion hydration therapy, serums infusion, oxygen infusion extractions and LED Light treatment.

title: Custom Facial
description: A customized facial is a completely personalized facial designed to treat any and all skin concerns you are facing.

title: Vitamin C Infusion Treatment
description: This relaxing vitamin C facial will help give your skin a healthy and radiant glow, targeting wrinkles, uneven skin colour and sun damage.

title: Acne Facial
description: Designed to combat acne, blackheads and blemishes with a minimal amount of side effects. They focus mainly on cleanses, extractions, facial masks and blue light therapy to clean and invigorate your skin.

title: Teem Facial
description: Designed to address breakouts that are associated with adolescent changes that affect teenager skin.
